name: Together: Amna & Saif
description:
Together: Amna & Saif is a couch co-op adventure puzzle game made to be shared with those closest to you, or those you want to be closer to. It gets you to talk, interact and think about each other. The resulting near constant player interaction is what makes Together fun and unique.
Story
You play as Amna and Saif, a mother and son. A mysterious forest appears suddenly and Amna's daughter Aisha is taken up within it. Only together can you journey through the trials of the landscape and past the great beasts of the forest to find her.

Play with those you love
We want everyone to enjoy the game. We have kept the controls simple and the core game accessible. The emphasis is on interdependence and communication.

Challenge When You Need It
There are optional objectives that are interwoven throughout the main campaign that even the most avid gamers find challenging.

Accessibility
Colors used in game mechanics were planned with the color blind in mind. Controls are kept simple to be accessible to as many people as possible. The game can be played with one hand. During the beta phase we will do everything we can to make the game playable for those with specific needs.
